channel.title: [PI] Reducing fishing spot radius
channel.description:
All my fishing spots have a click radius of 3 (by that I mean that 3 squares in every direction around the fishing spot you can still click the fishing spot). If that isn't quite clear enough, which I know I would be confused by my explanation...Here is a picture: [URL=http://s425.photobucket.com/user/enahsh2o/media/3sqradius.png.html][IMG]http://i425.photobucket.com/albums/pp334/enahsh2o/3sqradius.png[/img][/URL]
Note: The red circle indicates where my mouse is, since my mouse didn't show up in the picture. Note2: Notice that even though my mouse is that far out it still shows that I can click on the fishing spot. Also, it turns out that in certain areas (like in the water) the fishing spots have an even bigger clicking area of 5-6 squares. :(
Long story short: I need to know how to reduce the clicking area of fishing spots. ;) Any help is always appreciated. Thank you.
Oh and if you are wondering why I want to change this. It is because when doing custom fishing spots they run into each other and it makes it hard/annoying to click on the spot you actually want to fish at.

item.title: [PI] Reducing fishing spot radius
item.dc:creator: @enahsh2o enahsh2o
item.description:
@enahsh2o wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:2, topic:529356”]clicking distance is handled in clickItem packet in PI :palm:

[hr]

npc clicking is handled in clickNpc packet in PI[/quote]
I already checked all the NPC and click related things, but you could be right and I passed over it somewhere.
I am checking for distance/fishing spot related things at the moment. Anything in particular you think I should search for to make my efforts more valid?

This is all I can find relating to a few of the fishing spots, and I am 90% sure it doesn’t have to do with the clicking area. (Besides what is in Fishing.java.)

[code]switch (i) {

	case 334:
	case 326:
	case 324:
	case 316:
		entityDef.aByte68 = 1;
		break;[/code]

Read full topic

All my fishing spots have a click radius of 3 (by that I mean that 3 squares in every direction around the fishing spot you can still click the fishing spot).
If that isn’t quite clear enough, which I know I would be confused by my explanation…Here is a picture:

Note: The red circle indicates where my mouse is, since my mouse didn’t show up in the picture.
Note2: Notice that even though my mouse is that far out it still shows that I can click on the fishing spot.
Also, it turns out that in certain areas (like in the water) the fishing spots have an even bigger clicking area of 5-6 squares.

Long story short:
I need to know how to reduce the clicking area of fishing spots.
Any help is always appreciated. Thank you.

Oh and if you are wondering why I want to change this. It is because when doing custom fishing spots they run into each other and it makes it hard/annoying to click on the spot you actually want to fish at.
